Meeting Notes - Product Roadmap Discussion

Date: January 15, 2024
Attendees: Sarah, Mike, Lisa, John

Key Discussion Points:
- The Q2 launch timeline seems aggressive but achievable
- Need to prioritize mobile experience over desktop features
- Budget concerns from leadership require cost optimization

Action Items:
1. Sarah will draft revised timeline by Friday
2. Mike to investigate cloud provider alternatives
3. Lisa scheduling user research sessions next week

Next meeting scheduled for January 22nd at 2pm.
